channel.title: Random Ramblings on Inner Daemons
channel.description: Recent content in Random Ramblings on Inner Daemons

item.title: Freedom
item.description: After a long time, finally I feel (somehow) free. No limits, no boundaries, just pure enjoyment and fun, sprinkled with small periods of apathy and tiredness. Nonetheless, the feeling of being able to do whatever I want with my time is an awesome experience. It’s been a while since I spent one entire day sleeping, watching movies, nibbling food and just being present. Somehow I’m starting to understand my true nature.
